name: Hotel San Jorge

reviews.text: Recently stayed at Hotel San Jorge and very much liked the facility. The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. They always had a smile and made you feel at home. The rooms were basic but clean which was nice. They have wifi which was great and two computers guests could use if they wanted. Restaurants were within walking distance which we appreciated not to mention the best coffee and dessert place, Jireth.
reviews.title: Great Hospitality

reviews.text: Would recommend this hotel if you are ever in Santa Rosa de Copan.
reviews.title: Friendly accommodating staff

reviews.text: Our Habitat for Humanity team stayed here during our build. The rooms were large enough for 3 of us to get around without being crowded. We had plenty of hot water in the shower. Jorge was always helpful, as was other staff. We had breakfast in the dining room, and lunches were packed and taken to the build site. The food was plentiful and good, much needed due to the energy we were expending. The hotel's central location is great for walking to restaurants and the cathedral. I know other Habitat teams have stayed here and they, too, were pleased with their experience. I would surely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Giant rooms, Central Location, Good Bargain, Great for Mission Teams

description: We are a family business and offer you the largest and more comfortable rooms in town and a touch of hospitality that will make you feel right at home.
